price: A nuk e shihni se si Allahu i ka krijuar shtatë qiejt njëri mbi tjetrin,
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: alam taraw kayfa khalaqa al-lahu sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan
